description: A 17-year-old is due to appear in court later over the fatal stabbing of Jordan Hogg in Middlesbrough.
title: Boy, 17, charged with murdering Jordan Hogg in Middlesbrough
title_page: Boy, 17, charged with murdering Jordan Hogg in Middlesbrough - BBC News
maintext:
A 17-year-old boy has been charged with murder after a man was fatally stabbed.
Jordan Hogg, 28, died in Fonteyn Court in Hemlington, Middlesbrough, shortly after midnight on Friday, Cleveland Police said.
The teenager, who was also charged with possession of an offensive weapon, has been remanded in custody and has appeared at Teesside Magistrates' Court.
Two men, aged 27 and 43, have previously been charged with murdering Mr Hogg.
